Name: Jack Point PDR (Preliminary Design Review)
Entry_Criteria: REQ-001 approved; ICD-001 draft complete; hazard analysis initiated
Exit_Criteria: Jack point locations baselined; adapter concepts selected; load cases agreed

Name: Jack Point CDR (Critical Design Review)
Entry_Criteria: PDR actions closed; FEA complete; FMEA approved
Exit_Criteria: Jack design frozen; procurement spec released; test plan approved

Name: Weighing System SRR (System Requirements Review)
Entry_Criteria: REQ-001 draft complete; certification basis identified
Exit_Criteria: Requirements baselined; accuracy class confirmed; environmental range agreed
Notes: Aligns with aircraft mass properties freeze

Name: Weighing System PDR
Entry_Criteria: SRR actions closed; uncertainty analysis complete; ATP draft ready
Exit_Criteria: Equipment selection justified; calibration chain defined; test approach approved

Name: LH₂ Algorithm Concept Review
Entry_Criteria: REQ-001 approved; thermodynamic model draft complete
Exit_Criteria: Algorithm concept selected; validation approach agreed; interface to tank sensors defined

Name: LH₂ Algorithm Validation Readiness Review
Entry_Criteria: CG uncertainty analysis complete; test plan approved
Exit_Criteria: Algorithm validated against synthetic data; ground test plan ready

Name: Adapter Material Selection Review
Exit_Criteria: Material selected; supplier qualified; contact stress analysis initiated

Name: Adapter Qualification Complete
Exit_Criteria: All test criteria met; inspection intervals validated; production spec released

Name: Data Interface Specification Review
Exit_Criteria: Interface specification baselined; security review passed; DPP team concurrence

Name: Integration Test Readiness Review
Entry_Criteria: ICD frozen; test environment ready; test procedures approved
Exit_Criteria: Test configuration verified; all interfaces connected; evidence export validated

Name: Interlock Architecture Review
Entry_Criteria: REQ-001 approved; FMEA initiated; sensor concepts defined
Exit_Criteria: Architecture selected; redundancy approach agreed; manual override concept approved

Name: Interlock System Qualification
Entry_Criteria: All tests executed; results documented; deviations dispositioned
Exit_Criteria: System qualified; operational procedures validated; training material approved

Name: LC01 Node Closure Review
Entry_Criteria: All KNOTs at CLOSED status; evidence packs complete; TT distributions calculated
Exit_Criteria: Node closed; residuals at target; lessons learned captured; TT awarded
